heroSection.video_tag: Your browser does not support the video tag.
heroSection.title_h1: Legal Solution for Your Debts | ATTLAS
heroSection.description_p: Benefits of Economic Insolvency, Suspension of Seizures, Immediate Protection Against Legal Proceedings.

solutionsSection.title_h1: SOLUTIONS AND BENEFITS DESIGNED FOR YOU

feature1.title: Free Consultation
feature1.description: Sign up and receive your first financial consultation at no cost.

feature2.title: Debt Clearance Certificate
feature2.description: We guide you until you receive your debt clearance certificate.

feature3.title: Discount on Overdue Debts
feature3.description: Settle your overdue debts with the highest discount.

feature4.title: Fixed Installment
feature4.description: Monthly payments tailored to your financial capacity.

whyUsSection.description_p: We want you to regain control of your life by helping you solve financial problems related to debt and regain access to credit.
whyUsSection.footer_p: JOIN THE FINANCIAL REVOLUTION WITH ATTLAS!

features.feature1: We conduct a diagnosis of your financial profile to understand your situation.
features.feature2: We negotiate the highest discount on each of your overdue debts.
features.feature3: Get more benefits with good payment behavior in your settlement plan.
features.feature4: We support and guide you from start to finish.

metaData.title: Legal Solution for Your Debts - Debt Restructuring | ATTLAS
metaData.description: At ATTLAS, we help you restructure your debts, suspend foreclosures, and protect yourself legally. Get free advice and settle your debts with the highest discounts. Contact us via WhatsApp!

openGraph.title: ATTLAS - Ultimate Solution to Debt Problems in Colombia
openGraph.description: Immediate legal protection against foreclosures and judicial executions. Personalized debt restructuring program for Colombians.

twitter.title: Legal Debt Solution | ATTLAS Colombia
twitter.description: Immediate protection against foreclosures and debt restructuring. Get your free consultation today!

heroSection.description_p: We provide legal advice and representation for individuals facing financial difficulties, helping them suspend foreclosures, negotiate payment agreements, and restructure their debts under the Insolvency Law.

feature1.title: Foreclosure Suspension
feature1.description: We stop foreclosure and asset auction processes during negotiations

feature2.title: Debt Restructuring
feature2.description: We renegotiate payment terms with financial institutions

feature4.title: Asset Protection
feature4.description: Legal strategies to preserve your essential assets

feature5.title: Debt Cancellation
feature5.description: Legal management to eliminate unpayable balances

feature6.title: Interest Suspension
feature6.description: We stop the excessive growth of debts

feature7.title: Specialized Legal Defense
feature7.description: Representation in judicial and administrative proceedings

requirementsSection.description_p: Our economic insolvency law offers multiple benefits and guarantees for individuals and businesses facing financial difficulties.
